result.execSummary:
The defendant Michael D. Golownia was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Bail Jumping-Felony, a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: $518 costs--DOC collect within first 6 months on probation.  If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.

records.addlTxt: Defendant Michael D. Golownia in court in custody with attorney Michael Shannon Murphy.  Scott H. Dirks appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Sentence withheld, Court orders 3 years probation, consecutive to 14CF2454; DOC to collect $518 costs within first 6 months on probation; no sentence credit if revoked.  Felon warnings advised.

Defendant Michael D. Golownia in court with attorney Michael Shannon Murphy.  Gerald Anthony Urbik appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Bond revoked, taken forthwith.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for September 23, 2015 at 02:30 pm.

Defendant Michael D. Golownia in court with attorney Michael Shannon Murphy.  Mark M. Jahnke appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Deft pleads Guilty freely and voluntarily to Count 1; Court accepts plea and finds Deft Guilty; Counts 2 and 3 Dismissed; PSI ORDERED due 09-01-2015; Bond continued, May not consume any alcohol or non-prescription drugs  Sentencing hearing scheduled for September 8, 2015 at 02:30 pm.

Defendant Michael D. Golownia in court with attorney Michael Shannon Murphy.  Scott H. Dirks appeared for the State of Wisconsin. JURY TRIAL WAIVED freely and voluntarily; State Consents;  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for July 7, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Michael D. Golownia in court with attorney Michael Shannon Murphy.  Jodi Dabson Bollendorf appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Status conference scheduled for June 3, 2015 at 08:30 am.  Status conference scheduled for June 8, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Calendar call on March 19, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Michael D. Golownia in court with attorney Michael Shannon Murphy.  Kerra Stumbris appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Information filed, copy to Defendant, reading waived.  Defendant pleads not guilty and jury trial to be set.

records.courtRptr: D Nelson / J Klaren / M Lindbloom

records.addlTxt: Defendant Michael D. Golownia in court with attorney Michael Shannon Murphy.  Anne Theresa Nack appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Warrant vacated.  Complaint filed, copy to Defendant, penalties advised, rights given, reading waived.  Defendant waives preliminary hearing freely and voluntarily.  Court accepts waiver and binds the Defendant over for the filing of an Information.  Arraignment scheduled for February 18, 2015, at 1:00 pm.
Defendant appeared in Court.  Original returned 2-10-2015.
